name: purescript-deku
description: A friendly tree-like structure in the browser.

scripts.build-docs: npx spago -x examples.dhall bundle-app --main Deku.Example.Docs.Static.Build --to examples/docs/Static/make.js && npx spago -x examples.dhall bundle-app --main Deku.Example.Docs.Static.Live --to examples/docs/Static/bundle.js --minify && cd examples/docs/Static && node make.js > index.html && cd ../../..
scripts.snapshot: npm run bundle:performance && spago -x test/test.dhall run --main Performance.Snapshot.Write
scripts.test:optimizer-performance: npm run bundle:optimizer-performance && spago -x test/test.dhall run --main Performance.Main
scripts.test:performance: npm run bundle:performance && spago -x test/test.dhall run --main Performance.Main
scripts.bundle:examples: python makeExampleStrings.py && spago -x examples.dhall bundle-app --main Deku.Example.HelloWorld --to examples/hello-world/index.js
scripts.bundle:optimizer-performance: spago -x test/test-optimized.dhall build && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Performance.Test.App --to test/test.js
